subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The hopes of making a big free-agent signing in 2010, plus a shrinking salary cap, prevented any major moves by the Knicks’ president, Donnie Walsh.
snippet: The hopes of making a big free-agent signing in 2010, plus a shrinking salary cap, prevented any major moves by the Knicks’ president, Donnie Walsh.
